name: Lit (itch)
description:
A Game Jam game for the Dev Squad Jam!

Lit is the result of the combined effort of these folks!

Programmers: God (Matt), Fruitz, Beha Ulas 

Artists: Valmay, Alexander 'Xerahim' Kämpe

Sound Designers: Zwedgy, Drakostorm (Alaa)

Font Used In Game: "Riffic" - Credits: "InkyType"!

http://www.dafont.com/riffic.f...

We had to work with : 

-Theme: Darkness!

-Object 1: Fire!

-Object 2: Map!

https://itch.io/jam/dev-squad-...
